feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Build Work Zone, standard edition

entry.title: My processes(My requests) App will not show anything in SAP Build Work Zone with BTP Free trial
entry.content:
Hello experts

I am exploring SAP Build Work Zone and process automation with BTP free trial. I set up work zone Business site that can trigger a Process which was defined in Build Process automation and also monitor the progress of approvals performed in both Public and Shared environment with my inbox and Monitor workflow Apps in Work zone.

However, My processes app will not be able to show any Process details but loading eternally. Am I missing some configurations or this is happing simply because Work zone standard option or free trial is not supporting My processes(My requests) App?

I checked required configuration in SAP help and seems everything is set. I appreciate any help or thoughts ðŸ™‚

Kind Regards,

Eitaro

P.S.
These two sites helped me set up Work zone and Business sites.
Configure SAP Build Work Zone, Standard Edition | SAP Tutorials

Run a Business Process From the Business Site | SAP Tutorials

entry.title: Open a page from an app in SAP Build work zone standard edition
entry.content:
Hello Folks,

I am trying to open a page from a URL app by giving the complete page url in sap build work zone, standard edition.

The Page and app is created manually in the SAP Build work zone, Standard edition.

below is the url of the page which I have configure in app as url:

https://<Host Name>/Portal#Launchpad-openFLPPage?pageId=2566a3e3-a381-4cb2-8326-75f529f6f732
 
but after clicking on the app, it is giving error:
 
Sorry, the app couldn't be opened.
The navigation target "#Launchpad-openFLPPage?pageId=2566a3e3-a381-4cb2-8326-75f529f6f732%3Fsap-locale%3Den&sap-shell=FLP&sap-theme=custom_wasl_theme%40https%3A%2F%2Fwasl-sap-mobile-start.launchpad.cfapps.eu20.hana.ondemand.com%2Fcomsapuitheming.runtime%2Fthemeroot%2Fv1%2F~v%3DBase%3A11.31.0%2C*.*.custom_wasl_theme(sap_horizon)%3A20250527T062602Z%23zbupa-display%3Fsap-ui-app-id-hint%3D77c3e8a2-dece-475a-bd0c-5c317fd6d08b" of the app could not be resolved. This can be caused, for example, by an incorrect content configuration, an incorrect or missing role assignment, or because your current device is not supported.
 
 
Please let me know if there is any missing configuration for this or is there any other wat to achieve this.
Thanks in advance.

Regards,
Rohit Gera

entry.title: To enable Studio Home Application in SAP Buildworkzone
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I have followed the prerequisites in the below help documentation to configure the Studio Home Application in SAP Buildworkzone.
https://help.sap.com/docs/build-process-automation/sap-build-process-automation/configure-studio-home-application?q=studio+home

However, I could not see the studio home application in the Buildworkzone. I have refreshed the HTML content manager. I don't see such application available in workzone, but the other apps like My Inbox, Visibility scenario, Process etc.
I also read the blog https://community.sap.com/t5/application-development-and-automation-blog-posts/empowering-business-to-manage-decisions-in-sap-build-process-automation/ba-p/14092130

Can someone help me to figure out what I was missing? or please chare clear steps to see the Studio Home application in Buildworkzone.

entry.title: Error on Logout event from SAP Build Work Zone in SAPUI5 page
entry.content:
I am trying to attach a callback to the Logout event from the SAP Build Work Zone in my SAPUI5 application, to then request a logout in my approuter application. This is the logic I added to enable the event:

// UI5 Component
export default class Component extends UIComponent {
	//...
	public init(): void {
		//...

		// Log out when the user clicks the logout button in the shell header (BWZ)
		Container.attachLogoutEvent(() => {
			console.log("Logout event triggered, redirecting to logout endpoint.");
			window.location.replace('/do/logout');
		}, false)
	}
}

 The callback is working on my local tests, and I can see the log message on the console. However, when I try to do same thing inside our SAP Build Work Zone subscription, the callback doesn't run and we see a error message:

 After investigating the source files I notices this error happens when the Logout Event is being created and a deprecated part of the code executes. I wasn't able to find any configurations on SAP Build Work Zone that would fix it, but I might have missed something?

Has anyone else seen this error before? How can I contact the SAP Build Work Zone team to get support?

Thanks

entry.title: [Free Tier] No IAS tenant available when trying to establish trust (SAP BTP)
entry.content:
Hello,

I'm using SAP BTP Free Tier (Pay-as-you-go) and trying to subscribe to services like SAP Build Work Zone and Launchpad.

However, when I try to "Establish Trust" in the subaccount, **no identity Authentication tenant is listed** in the tenant selection.

The screen just shows "No available tenant"

I alreay created an instance of "Cloud Identity Services(default)" in my subaccount. I also received an S-user via email.

Still, I cannot proceed because no IAS tenant is available for selection.

Here ar my details.

- Global Account ID: S0027108224

- Subaccount: dorandev

- Region: AWS South Korea

- Email: doran@doranlab.dev

How can I request or link an IAS tenant for this subaccount? Any help would be appreciated!

Thank you

entry.title: Cannot Update Content Package Due to ID Mismatch in SAP Build Work Zone
entry.content:
Hello experts,

I'm currently working with SAP Build Work Zone and encountered an issue while trying to update an existing content package.

Iâ€™m getting the following error message:

"Trying to upload a content package with a different ID than the ID of the existing content package."

Here is what Iâ€™ve done:

  • I modified the content and re-zipped it with the correct structure (manifest.json, artifacts/, i18n/ at root level).

  • In the manifest.json, the sap.package.id is still exactly the same:

    json
     
    { "sap.package": { "id": "cnma.contentPackage" } }

The strange thing is:

  • I uploaded a similar package 2 days ago with the same ID, and it worked fine. Now even small changes result in this error.

Looking forward to your advice and experience.
Appreciate your support! ðŸ™Œ

entry.title: Content package build - showing No src config for role/space/page Error
entry.content:
While content package building , i can see many errors in the terminal showing "No src config for role/space/page" error messages.
But for the card, the build was successfully completed. Anyone have any thoughts about why the error is showing up for space,role and page ?

Attaching the content.json file and error screenshot, project file structure.
Please help !!!

SAP Build Work Zone, standard edition SAP BTP, Cloud Foundry runtime and environment 

Content.json 

{
  "sample-role1": {
    "type": "role",
    "src": {
      "from": "./poc/src",
      "content": "role.json"
    }
  },
  "card-sample": {
    "type": "card",
    "src": {
      "from": "./poc/src",
      "path": "./",
      "build": "",
      "package": "",
      "manifest": "src/manifest.json"
    }
  },
  "space_1": {
    "type": "space",
    "src": {
      "from": "./poc/src",
      "content": "space_1.json"
    }
  },
  "space_2": {
    "type": "space",
    "src": {
      "from": "./poc/src",
      "content": "space_2.json"
    }
  },
  "page_1_1": {
    "type": "workpage",
    "src": {
      "from": "./poc/src",
      "content": "page_1.json"
    }
  },
  "page_1_2": {
    "type": "workpage",
    "src": {
      "from": "./poc/src",
      "content": "page_1_2.json"
    }
  },
  "page_2_1": {

    }
  },
  "page_2_2": {

    "src": {
      "from": "./poc/src",
      "content": "page_2_2.json"
    }
  }
}

entry.title: SAP Build Work Zone Free Sevice Plan limit reached
entry.content:
Dear SAP Community, 

Following with the restriction known of SAP Build Work Zone free tier service, 3434634 - SAP Build Work Zone Free Sevice Plan limit reached

I've only assigned Laundpad_Admin role to one user, which is my id. But during this month, i login to Designtime site, I received limit reached page. I'm puzzled why only one admin is assigned in my subaccount but i received the limitation. 

Anyone know is there application log on checking who are the user accessing Work Zone as an admin from BTP subaccount usage?

 

Regards,

Ben

entry.title: HTML5 not visible in the BWZ
entry.content:
Hello everyone!

I am trying to deploy this template app from the SAP documentation through Cloud Foundry:
build-workzone-integration/standard/html5-content-provider-sample/ManageProducts at main Â· SAP-samples/build-workzone-integration

and after building the mta.yaml and deplying the .mtar archive, it does not appear in the Build Work Zone, standard edition. 

I have modified the Destinations accordingly, and they appear in the cocktpit > Destinations. The app itself also appears in the cockpit > HTML5 Applications, and it runs smoothly. 

Yet, nothing appears in the Build work zone Content manager, or in the Content provider, even after a refresh.

I have noticed that I could add a new content provider, using the two Destinations generated during deployment, and that makes a role available, but no App, no catalog, and no group, as defined in the cdm.json. This content provider is thus not really useful, and anyway it defeats the purpose of deploying the app and its content through GACD. 


Has there been any changes in the objects that can be deployed with the cdm? The last modifications in the repo are 10 months old so it's possible, but I can't find anything about that in the documentation or the blog.

I've been stuck on this issue for the better part of the week, and while I think I have made some progresses, I'm still at loss about the root of the issue.

Thanks a lot for your guidance!

entry.title: On-premises S/4 app exposed to SAP Build Work Zone, but not showing up
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I followed the steps from the official guide to publish an on-premise S/4HANA application to SAP Build Work Zone. The tile appears correctly in the Work Zone, but when I click on it, I get the error message:
"No suitable resource found", and the app does not launch.

Has anyone encountered this issue before?
What configuration or setting should I check to make the app display properly?

Any help would be greatly appreciated!

Best regards,

Exposing On-Premise S/4 Apps to SAP Build Work Zon... - SAP Community

entry.title: Myinbox in Work Zone return internal server error 500
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

we have enabled Fiori application MyInbox into BTP Work Zone using content provider from our onpremise S4HANA as well as propagated required user roles, however when we open the Myinbox tile, we got "Internal server error 500".

 

Interesting is, that we can actually see the number of tasks inside myinbox correctly in preview of tile, so it's gathering the data correctly.

The browser tracing show nothing more than this:

We've checked all logs from following areas - cloud connector, ICM, gateway logs, sm21, st22, su53, all dev_* traces, srt_util, /iwfnd/TRACES, certificates, Work Zone logs ... = nothing.

What is not clear to me, is in Gateway logs - I can see GET on count of items in my inbox, but then nothing else. No error nor success, even I open myinbox in same time.

We've also checked and did various combinations of role assignment, configured Cloud Identity Services, cyphers, system resources.... nothing helped.

Odata activated and My Inbox configured according to this SAP Fiori Apps Reference Library

Just for the record, the myinbox accessed from onprem Fiori works as expected - using the same user.

Any idea?

Thanks a lot,

Miro

However, suddenly it stopped executing these features, saying it cannot connect to my system.All destinations are correct, the identity propagation is as well, the services are active, and the user has permission; I have no idea what it could be

entry.title: How to add a Shell Plugin on SAP Build Work Zone Standard Edition
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I'm currently working on a project using SAP Build Work Zone, Standard Edition and I would like to add a Shell Plugin to customize the footer

I have gone through the official documentation, but I still have a few questions:

  1. Is it possible to use Shell Plugins in Standard Edition, or is it limited to Advanced Edition only?

  2. If yes, is there any step-by-step guide or sample project available for the Standard Edition?

  3. How can I properly register the Shell Plugin in the Work Zone environment after deployment (via HTML5 apps or Content Provider)?

Any help or shared experience would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks in advance!

Best regards,
Giang

entry.title: SAP work zone site tile is not loading in i-frames when clicked second time after opening one tile.
entry.content:
2025-07-17 09:48:01.663500 App-defined navigation mode is not valid! - Fallback to URL Template's capability sap.ushell.ApplicationType

Issue replication: 

01) configured Fiori tiles My Inbox, Manage sales order, Manage sales order.

02) open sap work zone site and click on My Inbox tile OPENS.
03) Nav back to home page click on any tile app is not loading. - miss match in iframe container parent id
04) each time need to refresh home page to open\navigate on click on tile.

tiles, catalog, spaces are exposed from backend system.

Tried changing sap ui5 version from site URL sap-ui-version=****

Authentication we are using user id and password  to backend

change in iframe container parent id when navigate back and trued to click on another tile.

entry.title: What has happened to Workzone page layouts with the latest release??!!
entry.content:
The latest Workzone release now accommodates an 8 column wide grid (previously 6 was the max) and the overall page max-width has increased. It also behaves differently than before with varying screen width: previously there were fixed dimensions at different break points. Now is scales elastically.

What this means is now my entire site, built on a 6 column grid with the old max-width just looks terrible.

I am super unhappy about this.

I can't believe SAP has made this change unilaterally with no way to flip back. The balance and proportions that I've been working with months are now wrong with two weeks before launch. It's a huge disrespect. Frowny emoticon to SAP.

entry.title: Request for Guidance on Notification Navigation in SAP Build Work Zone
entry.content:
Hello expert,

I have a process as shown in the picture.

I want the process to send a notification to Work Zone after I complete the approval step. When I click on that notification, it should navigate to the app I configured. 

And currently, Iâ€™m able to send a notification to Work Zone after the approval step is completed, as shown in the screenshot below

Now, I would like to implement the navigation behavior when clicking on the notification. Could you please guide me on how to achieve this? 

I sincerely appreciate your kind guidance and continued support. Thank you very much!

Best regards,

Giang

entry.title: UI Integration Card Error while accessing in SAP Build Work Zone, Standard Edition
entry.content:
Hi Folks,

I have developed a UI Imtegration Card in BAS (Using the template UI Integration Card and able to do the preview there as it is getting data from Odata Service. PFA the preview for same.

After adding that Card in the Build Work Zone, Standard Edition it is giving error below error:

Destination "ecqrtcard" could not be resolved.

No technical destination found. Content Channel ID: "ovps". Please contact your administrator.

PFA the error screen shot along with destination configuration.

 

In BAS preview it is working means it is getting data from odata using the destination but in build work zone it is giving destinaiton error.

 

Please suggest what can be the issue.
